headline.main: MAKERS WORRIED ON TRANQUILIZERS; Drug Industry Is Disturbed by a Decline in Sales and Antitrust Actions MAKERS WORRIED ON TRANQUILIZERS

docs.abstract: US indus disturbed by sales drop, pub criticism of pricing policy and by antitrust suit against 2 leading cos; new research discussed; illus
